code.description: A unique field code. A unique field identifier is used in API requests. Can contain only letters, digits and underscore. Starts with letter.

workspace.description: The workspace reference to which the field belongs.

entity.description: The entity name to which the field belongs. Should be only one of **orders** or **shipments**.

fieldType.extra:
**supported field types:**
- **text**
- **date**
- **phone**
- **password**
- **email**
- **number**
- **link**
- **select**
- **array**
- **label**

> Depended on the selected field type, the corresponded validation rule will be applied for the field.

readonly.description: Determines if the field is not writeable.

sorting.description: Determines if the field can be used for sorting.

selectOptions.description: Options for **select** field type. Represented by the FieldSelectOptions object.

visibleExpr.description: The expression that allows to determinate if field should be visible.

validation.description: The validation rules for the fields.

default.description: The default value for the field.

placeholder.description: The placeholder value for the field.

refreshOnChange.description: Determines if the entity will be refreshed after field changes.

helperText.description: The helper text for the field.
helperText.example: Enter your business email to receive all emails from support team.

tags.description: The list of tags for the field.

primary.description: Primary field means defined statically. Custom field is from EAV

workspace.description: The workspace reference to which the order belongs.

orderNumber.description: A number associated with a purchase order.

externalSourceIntegration.description: The workflow reference to integration for ecommerce store.

externalSourceSyncId.description: The id of the order in ecommerce store (WooCommerce, Shopify, etc.).

externalSourceUrl.description: The url of the order in ecommerce store.

subtotal.description: The current subtotal price of the order in the store currency. Default value is **0**

total.description: The current total price of the order in the store currency. Default value is **0**

currency.description: A three-letter currency code. Default value is **USD**

orderStatus.description: The current status of order. Represented by the Status object.

createdAt.description: The date and time (in ISO-8601 format) when the order was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time (in ISO-8601 format) when the order was updated.

shipments.description: List of [shipment](/docs/Shipment/shipment.html) references that belong to the order.

shippingAddress.description: The mailing address to where the order will be shipped. Represented by the Address object.

billingAddress.description: The mailing address associated with the payment method. Represented by the Address object.

fulfillmentStatus.description:
The fulfillment status code. The calculation is based on **qty** and **fulfilledQty** properties
of children order items.
- **not_fulfilled** - order does not contain any shipped order items
- **partial** - order contains at least one shipped order item, and at least one not shipped order item
- **fulfilled** - all order items of the order are shipped

id.description: A version 4 UUID. A unique order identifier is used in API requests.

workspace.description: The workspace reference to which the order belongs.

orderNumber.description: A number associated with a purchase order.

externalSourceIntegration.description: The workflow reference to integration for ecommerce store.

externalSourceSyncId.description: The id of the order in ecommerce store (WooCommerce, Shopify, etc.).

externalSourceUrl.description: The url of the order in ecommerce store.

subtotal.description: The current subtotal price of the order in the store currency. Default value is **0**

total.description: The current total price of the order in the store currency. Default value is **0**

currency.description: A three-letter currency code. Default value is **USD**

productOptions.description: The list of product custom options (size, color, weight, etc.) in the form OPTION_CODE => OPTION_VALUE.

qty.description: The number of items that were purchased. Default value is **0**.

price.description: The price of the item in the shop currency. Default value is **0**.

rowTotal.description: The amount of the purchased item in the shop currency. Calculated as **qty * price**.

externalProductId.description: The id of the product in ecommerce store (WooCommerce, Shopify, etc.).

externalSourceSyncId.description: The id of the order item in ecommerce store (WooCommerce, Shopify, etc.).

externalSourceIntegration.description: The workflow reference to integration for ecommerce store.

product.description: The [product](/docs/Product/product.html) reference to which this item is related.

productVariant.description: The [product variant](/docs/Product/product-variant.html) to which this item is related.

imageUrl.description: The link to a product image in ecommerce store (WooCommerce, Shopify, etc.).

fulfilledQty.description: The number of items that were fulfilled. Calculated as the amount of all shipmentItem.qty

trackingNumber.description: A tracking number, provided by the shipping company.

trackingStatus.description: The code of the shipment's current [tracking status](tracking-statuses.html).
trackingStatus.extra:
- **pre_transit** - Carrier has received information about the package, but it has not yet been scanned and picked up.
- **no_info** - A shipping label has been created, but the package has not yet been scanned and/or picked up by the carrier.
- **in_transit** - A package is travelling to its destination. You may receive multiple updates of this type as the package travels to its destination.
- **delivery_in_progress** - A package has reached the local area and is in the process of being delivered.
- **delivered** - The package has been delivered
- **unsuccessful_delivery** - Carrier attempted to deliver, but failed, and usually leaves a notice and will try to deliver again.
- **error** - Customs hold or any shipping exceptions. Please contact the carrier.
- **expired** - A package has no tracking information for 30 days since it was created.
- **available_for_pickup** - The package is available for pickup from the carrier's facility.
- **cancelled** - The delivery has been cancelled.
- **return_to_sender** - The package was not delivered and is now on its way back to the sender.
- **transit_limit_exceeded** - The package has been in transit way longer than normal transit time allows. Please contact the carrier.

orderNumbers.description: List of order numbers to which the shipment belongs.

daysInTransit.description: The number of days from the moment of sending to receiving of the parcel. The "Days in Transit" is the number of days from which the parcel transitioned into an active in-transit status. So once a parcel reaches end status or finite status, something like delivered or canceled or error or other finite states or return back to the sender (that is also finite state) then the days in transit calculation is no longer applied. So we're calculating the days when the parcel actually in transit. That's exactly what it is.

daysInIdle.description: This field is calculated based on idle statuses or the statuses when the shipment actually was created, but it doesn't have a tracking number. So this is a pre-shipment state, or pre-transit state, no info state, whenever we are actually ordering the parcels from a supplier and we don't have confirmation from their end or the tracking number for the parcel. Once the parcel transitions to an in-transit state or other active statuses or any finite statuses, then the  "days in idle" counter stops to be calculated.

originCarrier.description: The code of origin [carrier](https://trackmage.com/carriers/). Origin Carrier will be identified automatically based on Tracking Number. Sometimes the carrier cannot be identified. In that case, the system will return the error with the suggested carriers list in the payload. The value of this field can be specified only once in POST request.

originCountryIso2.description: The two-letter [country code](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui) corresponding to the origin country.

destinationCountryIso2.description: The two-letter [country code](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui) corresponding to the destination country.

expectedDeliveryDate.description: Shipment expected delivery date (in ISO-8601 format).

createdAt.description: The date and time (in ISO-8601 format) when the shipment was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time (in ISO-8601 format) when the shipment was updated.

lastStatusUpdate.description: The date and time (in ISO-8601 format) when the tracking status was updated.

workspace.description: The workspace reference to which the shipment belongs.

orders.description: List of order references to which the shipment belongs.

shipmentItems.description: List of shipment items references that belong to the shipment.

externalSourceIntegration.description: The workflow reference to integration for ecommerce store.

externalSourceSyncId.description: The id of the shipment in ecommerce store (WooCommerce, Shopify, etc.).

fulfillmentIntegration.description: The workflow reference to integration for fulfillment source.

fulfillmentSyncId.description: The id of the shipment in the fulfillment source system (AliExpress, Amazon, etc.).

address.description: The mailing address to where the order will be shipped. Represented by the Address object.

shipmentStatus.description: The current status of shipment. Represented by the Status object.

trackingNumber.description: A tracking number, provided by the shipping company.

trackingStatus.description: The code of the shipment's current [tracking status](tracking-statuses.html).
trackingStatus.extra:
- **pre_transit** - Carrier has received information about the package, but it has not yet been scanned and picked up.
- **no_info** - A shipping label has been created, but the package has not yet been scanned and/or picked up by the carrier.
- **in_transit** - A package is travelling to its destination. You may receive multiple updates of this type as the package travels to its destination.
- **delivery_in_progress** - A package has reached the local area and is in the process of being delivered.
- **delivered** - The package has been delivered
- **unsuccessful_delivery** - Carrier attempted to deliver, but failed, and usually leaves a notice and will try to deliver again.
- **error** - Customs hold or any shipping exceptions. Please contact the carrier.
- **expired** - A package has no tracking information for 30 days since it was created.
- **available_for_pickup** - The package is available for pickup from the carrier's facility.
- **cancelled** - The delivery has been cancelled.
- **return_to_sender** - The package was not delivered and is now on its way back to the sender.
- **transit_limit_exceeded** - The package has been in transit way longer than normal transit time allows. Please contact the carrier.

orderNumbers.description: List of order numbers to which the shipment belongs.

daysInTransit.description: The number of days from the moment of sending to receiving of the parcel. The "Days in Transit" is the number of days from which the parcel transitioned into an active in-transit status. So once a parcel reaches end status or finite status, something like delivered or canceled or error or other finite states or return back to the sender (that is also finite state) then the days in transit calculation is no longer applied. So we're calculating the days when the parcel actually in transit. That's exactly what it is.

daysInIdle.description: This field is calculated based on idle statuses or the statuses when the shipment actually was created, but it doesn't have a tracking number. So this is a pre-shipment state, or pre-transit state, no info state, whenever we are actually ordering the parcels from a supplier and we don't have confirmation from their end or the tracking number for the parcel. Once the parcel transitions to an in-transit state or other active statuses or any finite statuses, then the  "days in idle" counter stops to be calculated.

Sometimes the carrier cannot be identified. In that case, the system will return the error with the suggested carriers list in the payload. The value of this field can be specified only once in POST request.

destinationCountryIso2.description: The two-letter [country code](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui) corresponding to the destination country.

updatedAt.description: The date and time (in ISO-8601 format) when the shipment was updated.

lastStatusUpdate.description: The date and time (in ISO-8601 format) when the tracking status was updated.

trackingStatus.description: The code of the shipment's current [tracking status](tracking-statuses.html).
trackingStatus.extra:
- **pre_transit** - Carrier has received information about the package, but it has not yet been scanned and picked up.
- **no_info** - A shipping label has been created, but the package has not yet been scanned and/or picked up by the carrier.
- **in_transit** - A package is travelling to its destination. You may receive multiple updates of this type as the package travels to its destination.
- **delivery_in_progress** - A package has reached the local area and is in the process of being delivered.
- **delivered** - The package has been delivered
- **unsuccessful_delivery** - Carrier attempted to deliver, but failed, and usually leaves a notice and will try to deliver again.
- **error** - Customs hold or any shipping exceptions. Please contact the carrier.
- **expired** - A package has no tracking information for 30 days since it was created.
- **available_for_pickup** - The package is available for pickup from the carrier's facility.
- **cancelled** - The delivery has been cancelled.
- **return_to_sender** - The package was not delivered and is now on its way back to the sender.
- **transit_limit_exceeded** - The package has been in transit way longer than normal transit time allows. Please contact the carrier.

orderNumbers.description: List of order numbers to which the shipment belongs.

daysInTransit.description: The number of days from the moment of sending to receiving of the parcel. The "Days in Transit" is the number of days from which the parcel transitioned into an active in-transit status. So once a parcel reaches end status or finite status, something like delivered or canceled or error or other finite states or return back to the sender (that is also finite state) then the days in transit calculation is no longer applied. So we're calculating the days when the parcel actually in transit. That's exactly what it is.

daysInIdle.description: This field is calculated based on idle statuses or the statuses when the shipment actually was created, but it doesn't have a tracking number. So this is a pre-shipment state, or pre-transit state, no info state, whenever we are actually ordering the parcels from a supplier and we don't have confirmation from their end or the tracking number for the parcel. Once the parcel transitions to an in-transit state or other active statuses or any finite statuses, then the  "days in idle" counter stops to be calculated.

originCarrier.description: The code of origin [carrier](https://trackmage.com/carriers/). Origin Carrier will be identified automatically based on Tracking Number. Sometimes the carrier cannot be identified. In that case, the system will return the error with the suggested carriers list in the payload. The value of this field can be specified only once in POST request.

originCountryIso2.description: The two-letter [country code](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui) corresponding to the origin country.

destinationCountryIso2.description: The two-letter [country code](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui) corresponding to the destination country.

expectedDeliveryDate.description: Shipment expected delivery date (in ISO-8601 format).

createdAt.description: The date and time (in ISO-8601 format) when the shipment was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time (in ISO-8601 format) when the shipment was updated.

lastStatusUpdate.description: The date and time (in ISO-8601 format) when the tracking status was updated.

workspace.description: The workspace reference to which the shipment belongs.

orders.description: List of order references to which the shipment belongs.

shipmentItems.description: List of shipment items references that belong to the shipment.

externalSourceIntegration.description: The workflow reference to integration for ecommerce store.

externalSourceSyncId.description: The id of the shipment in ecommerce store (WooCommerce, Shopify, etc.).

fulfillmentIntegration.description: The workflow reference to integration for fulfillment source.

fulfillmentSyncId.description: The id of the shipment in the fulfillment source system (AliExpress, Amazon, etc.).

address.description: The mailing address to where the order will be shipped. Represented by the Address object.

shipmentStatus.description: The current status of shipment. Represented by the Status object.

trackingNumber.description: A tracking number, provided by the shipping company.

trackingStatus.description: The code of the shipment's current [tracking status](tracking-statuses.html).

- **pre_transit** - Carrier has received information about the package, but it has not yet been scanned and picked up.
- **no_info** - A shipping label has been created, but the package has not yet been scanned and/or picked up by the carrier.
- **in_transit** - A package is travelling to its destination. You may receive multiple updates of this type as the package travels to its destination.
- **delivery_in_progress** - A package has reached the local area and is in the process of being delivered.
- **delivered** - The package has been delivered
- **unsuccessful_delivery** - Carrier attempted to deliver, but failed, and usually leaves a notice and will try to deliver again.
- **error** - Customs hold or any shipping exceptions. Please contact the carrier.
- **expired** - A package has no tracking information for 30 days since it was created.
- **available_for_pickup** - The package is available for pickup from the carrier's facility.
- **cancelled** - The delivery has been cancelled.
- **return_to_sender** - The package was not delivered and is now on its way back to the sender.
- **transit_limit_exceeded** - The package has been in transit way longer than normal transit time allows. Please contact the carrier.

shipment.description: The shipment reference to which the shipment item belongs.

orderItem.description: The order item reference to which the shipment items item belongs.

qty.description: The number of items in the shipment. Default and the minimum value is 0. The value cannot be greater than available quantity of the order item (orderItem.qty - orderItem.fulfilledQty).

externalSourceSyncId.description: The id of the shipment item in ecommerce store (WooCommerce, Shopify, etc.).
